text: Return a random word from a word list in python
I would like to retrieve a random word from a file using python, but I do not believe my following method is best or efficient.

code:
import fileinput
import _random
file = [line for line in fileinput.input("/etc/dictionaries-common/words")]
rand = _random.Random()
print file[int(rand.random() * len(file))],
